net.objectzoo.ebc.test

Class MockAction0

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.test.MockAction0
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.objectzoo.delegates.Action0

    public class MockAction0
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.objectzoo.delegates.Action0
    The MockAction0 is an Action0 implementation that can be used in (unit) tests to count the signals of a tested EBC. The MockAction0 can be invoked as many times as the maximum invocations allowed value given at construction time before throwing an AssertionError.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MockAction0()
      Creates a new MockAction0 with a maximum invocations allowed value of one
      MockAction0(int maxInvocationsAllowed)
      Creates a new MockAction0 with the given maximum invocations allowed value

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        The invoke method internally counts the number of invocations. Invocations are allowed as many times as the maximum invocation allowed parameter given at construction time specifies. Excessive calls lead to an AssertionError being thrown.
        Specified by:
        start in interface net.objectzoo.delegates.Action0
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if the maximum invocation allowed count has been exceeded

      • isInvoked

        public boolean isInvoked()
        Query if this MockAction0 has been invoked
        Returns:
        true if it has been invoked and false otherwise

      • getInvocationCount

        public int getInvocationCount()
        Retrieve the number of invocations that have been conducted on this MockAction0
        Returns:
        the number of invocations

      • assertInvoked

        public void assertInvoked()
        Assert that this MockAction0 has been invoked throwing an AssertionError if not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if this MockAction0 has not been invoked yet

      • assertInvoked

        public void assertInvoked(java.lang.String message)
        Assert that this MockAction0 has been invoked throwing an AssertionError with the given message if not.
        Parameters:
        message - the message for the thrown AssertionError
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if this MockAction0 has not been invoked yet
